name: Snaking in Circles
description:
I uploaded both a 3h and finished version.

This is a 1 button game where you run between or around circles. Pressing SPACE will exit a circle in a straight line. You do not have control as long as you are not in a circle. Travel the longest distance to get the highest score.

Things missing in the 3h version:
 - score
 - collision detection on the snake
- more levels
WARNING: Close the 3h version after you finished playing! Don't let it run in background or just leave it open!

Updated version is up! Took around 5.5h ... 3h is harder then I imagined ... next time! ^^

Thanks to Clarko (https://collision-check.itch.io/) for helping me to find an idea.
